review: I have a kindle Fire and the Chrome Cast is NOT compatible with that. I had to make shift a work to get it to work from my Kindle. Very disappointed especially after seeing what the Apple TV had to offer... If you want to stream Netflix and Hulu Chrome cast is fine. Any more that Chrome cast just won't do it!
author: stvbrtn

review: My husband wanted this and it works well with Netflicks and YouTube.  We had an issue when it was updated, but we used the settings to get us back to factory settings while they fix the glitch.  The one thing that is not as good is broadcasting from the browser, not an app, is often shaky.  Hopefully this will work out as more people have it and the updates come through.  All in all, the hubby is happy and we are having fun catching up on movies and TV shows.
author: Colleen E. Cunningham

review: I love this little dongle.  I use it along with a Nexus 7 to play Netflix and Youtube videos on the TV, and it works seamlessly. I've been using a Roku box for quite a while but I prefer using the tablet as a remote controller, and would use the Chromecast exclusively if only Amazon Prime would play nice with Google. In the meantime, the Roku box is still plugged in along side the Chromecast for a more extensive selection of streaming video options.
author: A. Arthur "Al the webmaster"

review: Works like it promises to work! Very cool. And easy to set up. I liked it so much that I bought 3 more as Xmas presents.
